Package HelperObject

Class PasswordStorage

java.lang.Object
HelperObject.PasswordStorage
public class PasswordStorage
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for storing passwords. Refer to the following links below for more information. https://github.com/defuse/password-hashing https://crackstation.net/hashing-security.htm#properhashing

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException
    Exception when unsafe to verify password on platform.
    static class  PasswordStorage.InvalidHashException
    Exception when hash is corrupted.

  • Method Details

    • createHash

      public static java.lang.String createHash​(java.lang.String password) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException
      Hashes password.
      Parameters:
      password - String that stores password value
      Returns:
      hashed password
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to verify password on platform

    • createHash

      public static java.lang.String createHash​(char[] password) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException
      Hashes password.
      Parameters:
      password - String that stores password value
      Returns:
      hashed password
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to verify password on platform

    • verifyPassword

      public static boolean verifyPassword​(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String correctHash) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException, PasswordStorage.InvalidHashException
      Verifies password.
      Parameters:
      password - String that stores password value
      correctHash - String that stores Hash value
      Returns:
      boolean value if password is verified, true if verified
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to verify password on platform
      PasswordStorage.InvalidHashException - hash is corrupted

    • verifyPassword

      public static boolean verifyPassword​(char[] password, java.lang.String correctHash) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException, PasswordStorage.InvalidHashException
      Verifies password.
      Parameters:
      password - char Array that stores password value
      correctHash - String that stores Hash value
      Returns:
      boolean value if password is verified, true if verified
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to verify password on platform
      PasswordStorage.InvalidHashException - hash is corrupted
